titleStmt.title: SII 4.814: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 814. (A.R. No. 2 of 1893). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SECOND PRAKARA OF THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . cakaraiyāṇṭu Āyirattorunūṟṟeḻupattiraṇṭiṉmel cellāniṉṟa mituṉanāyaṟṟu Aparapakṣattu pañcamiyum cevvā
ykkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa tiruvoṇattu nāḷ ceyaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu Eyiṟkoṭṭattu nakaraṅ kāñcipurattu Uṭaiyār tiruvekam
pamuṭaiyanāyaṉārkku namperāl Amutuceytaruḷukiṟa kaṇapatitevaṉcantikku veṇṭum tiruvamutupaṭikkum kaṟiyamutu Uḷḷiṭṭa veñcaṉa
ṅkaḷukkum cāttiyaruḷat tirupparivaṭṭaṅkaḷukkum tirumeṟpūccuk kaṟpūram paṉini ruḷḷiṭṭaṉattukkum tirucceṅkaḻunir Uḷḷiṭṭaṉattukkum I
ccanti pūcikkum nampimārkkum tirupparicārakaṟkkum tirumañcaṇameṭuppāṟkkum tiruppaḷḷittāmam toṭuppāṟkkum maṟṟum Ic
cantikku veṇṭum nivantaṅkaḷukkum Uṭalāka Immaṇṭalattut tāmaṟkoṭṭattuk kaḷattūr Uḷḷur tevatāṉam tiruviṭai
yāṭṭam nikki Ivvūr Aṭaṅkalum Iccantikku Uṭalāka Aṉaittu nellāyaṅkaḷum kācāyaṅka(ḷ)ḷum maṟṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭa
varikaḷumuṭpaṭat tevatāṉamāka Iṭṭom Iṉṉāḷmutal Ikkoyiltāṉattāṟ keṟka kaṭamai kuṭimai pokkaṟuviyate Itu
śrīmāheśvararakṣaiḥ ..
Digital edition of SII 4.814 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
